name.ja: <ruby>疾<rt>しっ</rt></ruby><ruby>風<rt>ぷう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>騎<rt>き</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>ガイア

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster this turn, inflict piercing battle damage (if the ATK of the attacking monster exceeds the DEF of the attack target, inflict the difference). Then, if you have no cards in your hand, you can draw 1 card.

materials.en: 1 Warrior Type monster with 2100 DEF + "Curse of Dragon"
